text: Candle lit close-ups. Christmas lights, floodlit buildings, fountains, and monuments. Subjects under bright street lamps.

text: Brightly lit home interiors at night. Fairs, amusement parks.

lightSource: Neon lights to landscape after sunset
text: Las Vegas or Times Square at night. Store windows. Campfires, bonfires, burning buildings. Ice shows, football, baseball etc. at night. Interiors with bright florescent lights.
